locs.text: diseukoga hwalseonghwadoemyeon saegsang-i sunhwandoebnida. geuleohji anh-eumyeon im-uiui saegsang-eul seontaeghasibsio.
da-eum sseugileulhagi jeon-e myeoch milli choleul gidalyeoyahabnikka?
saegsang sunhwan-i hwalseonghwa doen gyeong-u ProgressClockeseo saegsang-eul byeongyeonghagi jeon-e myeoch tig-i pil-yohabnikka? 1 tig = 0.5 cho
ProgressClockeun hwalseonghwa doen gyeong-u im-uiui saegsang-eul seontaeghabnida. geuleohji anh-eumyeon guseong-ui saegsang-eul sayonghasibsio.
eodubgehagi jeon-e myeoch gaeui wichiga kyeo jibnikka?
milli cho dan-wiui peideu aus jiyeon
tegseuteuga peideu ausdoegikkaji myeoch milli choleul gidalyeoyahabnikka?
tegseuteuleul dasi sseugi jeon-e myeoch milli choleul gidalyeoyahabnikka?
banghyang-eul im-uilo byeongyeonghagi jeon-e myeoch beon-ui waipeuleul suhaenghaeyahabnikka?
seontaeg yungwag-e pyosidoen tegseuteuga hangsang jung-ang-e issneunji yeobu.

konsol APIleul sayonghayeo tegseuteuleul jiugeona VT sikwonseuleul jiuneun deo ppaleun lain-eul sayonghalji yeobu-ibnida. Falseimyeon Marqueeneun jeogjeolhan VT sikwonseuleul sayonghabnida. geuleohji anh-eumyeon deo neulin konsol APIleul sayonghabnida.
da-eum saegsang-eul sseugi wihae Beats Per Minute dan-wileul sayonghalji yeobu-ibnida.
da-eum sseugileul suhaenghagi jeon-e daegihaeya haneun bundang biteu suneun eolmaibnikka?
BeatFaderneun hwalseonghwadoen gyeong-u im-uiui saegsang-eul seontaeghabnida. geuleohji anh-eumyeon guseong-ui saegsang-eul sayonghasibsio.
sae hwamyeon-e tegseuteuleul dasi sseugi jeon-e myeoch millicholeul gidalyeoya habnikka?

lain chaeugi paeteon-i modu daemunjalo inswaedoel ganeungseong(peosenteu)

seon chaeugi paeteon yuhyeongipnida. 0eun allyeojin etaoin munja paeteoneul inswaehago, 1eun etaoin munjaui jeonche paeteoneul inswaehamyeo, 2neun imuiui munja seteureul inswaehayeo jureul ppareuge chaeupnida.
